mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.sh_comment_catetory_id, a.content, a.add_time, b.id cid, b.name cname, (select nickname from nick order by rand() limit 1) nickname FROM sh_category_comment a left join sh_comment_catetory b on b.id = a.sh_comment_catetory_id where 1=1
and a.sh_comment_catetory_id = #{categoryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sh_category_comment ( sh_comment_catetory_id, content, add_time ) VALUES(#{categoryId},#{content},#{addTime} )
